document.full_text: lenders would be required to make sure prospective borrowers have the ability to repay their mortgages before giving them a loan, under a proposal released by the federal reserve on tuesday.
document.title: fed unveils proposal on mortgage standards
lines_and_colors: lenders would be required to make sure prospective borrowers have the ability to repay their mortgages before giving them a loan, under a proposal released by the federal reserve on tuesday.
